title: Browser Plugin Guide
introduction: This guide will walk you through how to install and use the AiToEarn browser plugin, enabling you to manage your social media accounts and publish content more conveniently.

step1.title: Step 1: Open Plugin Management Dialog
step1.content: On the AiToEarn platform page, click the plugin icon in the upper right corner to open the browser plugin management dialog.

step2.title: Step 2: Download the Plugin
step2.content: Select the download method in the dialog and click to download the plugin.
step2.note: Difference between Chrome Web Store and GitHub Release installation:
step2.noteItem1: Plugins downloaded from GitHub Release require you to enable developer mode in your browser to install, but the resources installed here are the latest plugins.
step2.noteItem2: Plugins downloaded from Chrome Web Store can be installed directly.

step3.title: Step 3: Check Installation Status
step3.content: After installation, click the browser's extensions button to check if the installation was successful.

step4.title: Step 4: Enter Plugin Details Page
step4.content: If the installation is successful, click on the plugin to enter the plugin details page.

step5.title: Step 5: Authorize the Plugin
step5.content: Click the "Authorize Now" button to authorize the plugin.

step6.title: Step 6: Confirm Plugin is Ready
step6.content: Permission has been granted successfully. Next, open the AiToEarn platform, refresh the page, and you will see the plugin is ready. Click on it to view details.

step7.title: Step 7: View Account Information
step7.content: If you have logged into the platforms supported by the plugin, you will see that the plugin has obtained the corresponding accounts.

step8.title: Step 8: Sync Accounts
step8.content: You can sync accounts to account management here. Click the [Sync] button, and the account will be synced to our database.

complete.title: Complete
complete.content: Now you can use the AiToEarn platform normally!

q1.question: Why does the plugin still show not logged in after I logged into Xiaohongshu?
q1.answer: You may not have logged into the Xiaohongshu Creator Center. On the Xiaohongshu homepage, click the button in the upper right corner to quickly log into the Xiaohongshu Creator Center.
